extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • playHeartEffect

        public static void playHeartEffect(@Nonnull
                   org.bukkit.Location location)
        Play heart particles at the given location.

        Implementation note: This method accomplishes the desired behavior by spawning a wolf, playing the wolf heart effect, and removing the wolf. Event handlers at the highest priority level are registered that will uncancel the spawn of this wolf.

        Parameters:
        location - The location at which to play the heart effect.

      • playFirework

        public static void playFirework(org.bukkit.Location location,
                org.bukkit.FireworkEffect... effects)

        This method provides a version independent way to instantly explode FireworkEffects at a given location. It uses setTicksLived to accomplish this.

        Parameters:
        location - The location at which to display the firework effects.
        effects - The firework effects to render.
